snippet.title: Lost in Random: The Eternal Die | Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Enter the Black Die and defy fate in Lost in Random: The Eternal Die, a fast-paced action roguelite set in the dark and whimsical world of Lost in Random. Play as Queen Aleksandra and her trusty die-companion, Fortune, as you battle twisted enemies, harness powerful relics and abilities, and roll the dice to take your vengeance and escape this nightmarish realm!

Free demo now available on Steam and Xbox! Launching in Summer 2025 on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch and PC. 

Play now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2564520/Lost_in_Random_The_Eternal_Die/

Play now on Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-GB/games/store/lost-in-random-the-eternal-die/9n72g399183f/?utm_source=lir_website

Learn more: https://lostinrandom.com/
